text: Bad Zwischenahn (Low German: Twüschenahn) is a town and a municipality in Ammerland, in Lower Saxony, Germany. It is on Zwischenahner Meer, about 15 km northwest of Oldenburg and about 70 km south of the North Sea coast. ==Twin towns – sister cities== Bad Zwischenahn is twinned with: * Centerville, United States * Gołuchów, Poland * Izegem, Belgium ==References== ==Other websites == * Category:Ammerland Category:Spa towns in Germany
title: Bad Zwischenahn
